arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًۭا
urdu:
📖 *Surah Al-Furqan 25:63*
“Rehman ke (sachche) banday wo hain jo zameen par narmi se chalte hain, aur jab jahil unse baat karte hain to wo salaam keh dete hain.”

arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
urdu:
📖 *Surah Al-Baqarah 2:286*
“Allah kisi par uski taqat se zyada bojh nahi daalta.”

📖 *Surah Ar-Rahman 55:13*
“Phir tum apne Rubb ki kaunsi kaun si ne’mat ko jhutlaoge?”

arabic: يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ
urdu:
📖 *Surah Al-Zumar 39:53*
“Apne nafs par zulm karne walon! Allah ki rehmat se mayoos na ho.”

📖 *Surah Al-Inshirah 94:6*
“Beshak har mushkil ke saath asani hai.”

📖 *Surah Al-Hadid 57:4*
“Wahi hai jisne zameen aur aasman 6 din mein banaye, aur uska arsh paani par tha.”

arabic: وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَـٰحِهَا
urdu:
📖 *Surah Al-A'raf 7:56*
“Zameen mein fasad na phailao jabke wo theek kar di gayi ho.”
